text: Wanda Ventham (born 5 August 1935) is an English actress. She is known for her role as Colonel Virginia Lake in the 1970s science-fiction television series UFO, and for her recurring role as Cassandra Trotter's mother Pamela Parry in the sitcom Only Fools and Horses between 1989 and 1992. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Sussex Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Brighton
title: Wanda Ventham
